missionProperties.startingObjective: Breach the facility to find the data core.
missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Doors are locked. A hero can attack a door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission progresses when the facility is breached.
{-} The heroes lose at the end of Round 5, or when all heroes are wounded.

changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to the data core.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You arrive at a quiet little test factory. You've been informed that it will significantly increase the efficiency of Imperial efforts if its construction is completed.

Three other teams have apparently tried and failed to sabotage the factory. Their  reports suggest sorne sort of reactive defense protocols.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked. A hero can attack a door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission progresses when the facility is breached.
{-} The heroes lose at the end of Round 5, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
As the core is destroyed, the defense protocols disengage. The alarms die down, and the lights go black.

If the Empire wants to use this facility for something, it'll be quite some time before they can get it up and running.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The facility's defenses are too much to  overcome. When you finally breach the door leading to the data core, you see it sliding down into the door to some other section of the facility beyond your reach.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} Increase the threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.

globalEvents.name: Guarded
globalEvents.eventText: As you break through the first door, you're assailed by a deafening mechanical grinding. Ahead, you see heavy shielding slide over the next door.

entityProperties.name: Facility Entrance
entityProperties.theText:
This door is labeled "Facility Entrance".

The door is locked. A hero can attack it (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked. A hero can attack a door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission progresses when the heroes find the data core.
{-} The heroes lose at the end of Round 5, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Open Side Door
globalEvents.eventText:
The side door collapses under your attacks.

If there was a neutral mission token next to the door you just opened, click on the token in the control area corresponding to the tokens' colors and click "Activate".

entityProperties.name: Side Door
entityProperties.theText:
This door is labeled "Side Door".

The door is locked. A hero can attack it (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).

globalEvents.name: Open Core Room
globalEvents.eventText: You reveal a small room with a data core humming, surrounded by red light. Destroying the data core would severely throw back the Empire's efforts.

entityProperties.name: Core Room Door
entityProperties.theText:
This door is labeled "Core Room".

The door is locked. A hero can attack it (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).

eventActions.theText: {-} A hero can interact with the data core to destroy it, ending the mission.

{-} Doors are locked. A hero can attack a door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The Rebels win when the data core is destroyed.
{-} The heroes lose at the end of Round 5, or when all heroes are wounded.
If there was a neutral mission token next to the door you just opened, click on the token in the control area corresponding to the tokens' colors and click "Activate".

The spaces separate from the map are the control room. Each time you open a door with a a blue, red, or yellow neutral mission token next to it, click on the token corresponding to the tokens' color and click "Activate".

Each time you attack a door with a green neutral mission token next to it, the attacker suffers 2 {H} for each green neutral mission token next to the door.

globalEvents.name: Defenses Blue 1
globalEvents.eventText:
Place a BLUE neutral mission token next do a closed door in the following order. You can click on a door to read its label.

1. If the Facility Entrance is closed, place it next to it.
2. If the Facility Entrance is open, but no heroes have yet entered Tile 28A, place it next to the Side Door.
3. If heroes have already entered Tile 28A, place it next to the Core Room Door.

globalEvents.eventText:
Place a BLUE neutral mission token next do a closed door in the following order. You can click on a door to read its label.

1. If the Facility Entrance is closed, place it next to it.
2. If the Facility Entrance is open, but no heroes have yet entered Tile 28A, place it next to the Side Door.
3. If heroes have already entered Tile 28A, place it next to the Core Room Door.

globalEvents.name: Defenses Yellow 2
globalEvents.eventText:
Place a YELLOW neutral mission token next do a closed door in the following order. You can click on a door to read its label.

1. If the Facility Entrance is closed, place it next to it.
2. If the Facility Entrance is open, but no heroes have yet entered Tile 28A, place it next to the Side Door.

globalEvents.name: Defenses End of Round
globalEvents.eventText: Imperial security protocols proceed to lock down the facility.

globalEvents.name: Activate Red
globalEvents.eventText:
Alarms blare through the facility.

If there are two red tokens next to this door, click "Activate Red" again.

globalEvents.name: Activate Yellow
globalEvents.eventText:
A blinding flash erupts from the door as it collapses.

Each hero within 5 spaces of the door tests {K}. Each hero who fails is Stunned.

If there are two yellow mission tokens next to the door, roll twice and pick the worse result.

entityProperties.name: Facility Entrance
entityProperties.theText:
This door is labeled "Facility Entrance".

The door is locked. A hero can attack it (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).

entityProperties.name: Side Door
entityProperties.theText:
This door is labeled "Side Door".

The door is locked. A hero can attack it (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).

entityProperties.name: Core Room Door
entityProperties.theText:
This door is labeled "Core Room".

The door is locked. A hero can attack it (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).

entityProperties.name: New Marker
entityProperties.theText: Apply *2* additional Health to door with a blue token next to it. If there are two blue tokens next to it, apply *4* additional Health instead.

entityProperties.name: Red Token
entityProperties.theText: Each time you open a door with a red neutral mission token next to it, click "Activate Red" once for each red token next too the door.

entityProperties.name: Green Token
entityProperties.theText: Each time you attack a door with a green neutral mission token next to it, the attacker suffers 2 {H} for each green neutral mission token next to the door.

entityProperties.name: Yellow Token
entityProperties.theText: Each time you open a door with a yellow neutral mission token next to it, click "Activate Yellow" once for each yellow token next too the door.

entityProperties.name: Data Core
entityProperties.theText:
The facility's date core is illuminated by a soft red light.

A hero can interact with the data core to destroy it, ending the mission.
